name: Fire Hawk: Thexder - The Second Contact
name_original: Fire Hawk: Thexder - The Second Contact
description:
Fire Hawk: Thexder - The Second Contact is an action game. It came out on 31-12-1990.
Fire Hawk: Thexder - The Second Contact is available on PC.
Mitsuhiro Mazda produced the game. It was directed by Ari Kamijō, Kazuyuki Ohata and Satoshi Uesaka. It was scored by Hiromi Ohba, Masahiko Yoshimura and Tadashi Shimayama.
